page.title: 09CRUDWELL -PUBS AND HOTELS
page.content: There are{two pubs in Crudwell,}one at each end of the village.They are{The {Wheatsheaf and The Plough.}These names reflect the farming activities of the area.Both pubs serve food.The Plough has a skittle alley. There are several places where{Bed and {Breakfast accommodation is available. There are also two comfortable hotels. {Crudwell Court Hotel}has been opened in recent years and has been modernised and refurbished from the country house already on the site.It stands in 3 acres of gardens and has the added attraction of an outdoor swimming pool. {The Mayfield House Hotel}has belonged to the present owners for five years and has recently been extended and renovated.The hotel stands in attractive gardens which supply fresh produce for the kitchen.
